title: Environmental Education through Digital Storytelling and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic awareness of environmental issues and digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning environment for working professionals. BYOD approach with personal devices. Conducts digital storytelling and collaborative learning activities on diverse environmental themes

learning_goals: Students can create digital stories connecting water-related myths with modern environmental issues
Students can share and expand knowledge about water cycles and usage patterns using the jigsaw cooperative learning method
Students can produce project outcomes proposing solutions to water issues at local and global levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
